text: Yrjö Osvald "Ossi" Rundberg (23 April 1927 – 5 November 2020) was a Finnish trumpeter, orchestra leader, composer, and record producer.Runne, Ossi in Uppslagsverket Finland. He was born in Viipuri, Finland. He conducted Finland's entries at the Eurovision Song Contest. He first conducted the entry "Playboy" (which he also composed) at Luxembourg in 1966. Runne died on 5 November 2020 in Helsinki at the age of 93.Musikens "grand old man" Ossi Runne är död ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Finnish musicians Category:Finnish composers Category:Finnish songwriters Category:Record producers
title: Ossi Runne
